resources.string: Are there any days of the week when you are absolutely NOT free?
Some clubs require extra fees- are you OK with clubs that have these extra costs?
Some clubs take place during a particular season- are there any seasons where you are NOT free?
Which of the following artistic pursuits interests you most?
Are you interested in doing anything athletic? If so, which of the following sounds most appealing to you?
Which of these political/social issues are you passionate about?
Which of the following school-related activities interests you?
Which academic field are you most interested in?
Welcome to the ZCHS Clubs App! Take the ClubFinder Quiz to find the clubs that are right for you by answering a few simple questions, or view all of ZCHS\'s clubs in the Club Catalogue.

Here are your results! Scroll through the list below and click on a club to see more detailed information about it. And if you feel like these clubs aren\'t perfect matches for you, you can go back and retake the quiz, or view all of ZCHS\'s clubs in the Club Catalogue.
